summary: This document is an email digest of news clippings from February 4, 2021, compiled by or for the SDNY (Southern District of New York). It contains headlines and brief summaries of various news articles, including one specifically about the Epstein victims compensation fund being suspended due to liquidity issues, and mentions Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: British socialite accused of recruiting young girls as victims for Jeffrey Epstein and participating in their abuse; mentioned in a news clip about her arrest.

persons.name: Michael Cohen
persons.context: Former lawyer and fixer for Donald Trump; mentioned in a news clip about hush money payments made before the 2016 election.

persons.name: Andrew Cuomo
persons.context: Governor of New York mentioned in a news clip about criticism of state policies regarding nursing-home deaths.

events.title: Epstein Victims Compensation Fund Suspended
events.description: The Epstein victims compensation fund was suspended due to liquidity issues.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in New Hampshire and accused of recruiting young girls for Jeffrey Epstein and participating in their abuse.

keyFacts: The Epstein victims compensation fund was suspended due to liquidity issues as of February 2021.
Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in New Hampshire on charges related to recruiting girls for Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a collection of news clippings from February 4, 2021, compiled for the Southern District of New York.
